item.title: 美元在非农就业数据公布前走弱，交易员权衡降息风险
item.description: 美元兑所有主要货币汇率均出现下跌，因美国经济再度显现疲软迹象，投资者纷纷加码押注美联储将降息。【原文：The dollar dropped against all of its major peers as investors ramped up bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts following fresh signs of weakness in the US economy.】

item.title: 印度城市化进程为房地产IPO创纪录之年奠定基础
item.description: 印度房地产开发商正转向资本市场融资，这表明他们对数百万人口向城市迁移将确保强劲需求的信心。【原文：India’s real estate developers are turning to capital markets to raise funds, signaling their confidence that the shift of millions of people toward cities will ensure robust demand.】

item.title: 中国股票获益于MSCI指数近三年来最大规模增持
item.description: 中国股票在MSCI核心指数中的净增持规模创近三年新高，为指数跟踪型投资者的资金流入奠定更强劲基础。【原文：Chinese shares have secured their biggest wave of net additions to MSCI Inc.’s key gauges in almost three years, setting the stage for stronger inflows from index-tracking investors.】

item.title: 中国餐饮连锁店在农历新年假期前关闭门店，股价暴跌
item.description: 中国一家高端上海菜连锁餐厅突然关闭了上海的10家分店，成为国内消费低迷的最新牺牲品，并在农历新年假期前夕引发食客的强烈抗议。【原文：One of China’s premium Shanghainese dining chains abruptly shut 10 outlets in the city, becoming the latest casualty of the country’s consumption slump and sparking an outcry from diners just days before the Lunar New Year holidays.】

item.title: 白宫修订美印贸易事实清单，删除"豆类"条目
item.description: 白宫修订了美印贸易协定事实清单，删除了关于豆类的表述，并修改了数字服务相关条款的措辞。【原文：The White House revised its factsheet on the US-India trade agreement by removing a reference to pulses and changing language around digital services.】

item.title: DQ及必胜客中国业务所有者拟以5亿美元出售
item.description: 知情人士透露，方源资本正考虑出售其在中国的必胜客和德芙连锁经营权。【原文：FountainVest Partners is considering selling the franchise operator of Papa John’s and Dairy Queen in China, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚指控另外两名中国人干涉外国事务
item.description: 澳大利亚当局指控另外两名中国公民涉嫌代表北京政府收集某佛教协会的信息，此案可能加剧两国关系紧张的风险。【原文：Australian authorities charged a further two Chinese citizens with allegedly collecting information about a Buddhist association on behalf of the government in Beijing, in a case that raises the risk of renewed tensions between the countries.】

item.title: 人工智能与美元走软推动新兴市场股市创历史新高
item.description: 新兴市场股票攀升至历史新高，亚洲科技股的强劲表现推动了这一涨势，市场对人工智能的乐观情绪以及美元走软共同助推了股价上涨。【原文：Emerging-market stocks climbed to a fresh record high, propelled by Asian technology shares on optimism over artificial intelligence and as the dollar weakened.】

item.title: 镍价延续涨势，印尼重申大幅削减采矿配额
item.description: 镍价连续第四日上涨，此前最大供应国印尼重申今年将大幅削减产量。【原文：Nickel extended gains for a fourth day after top supplier Indonesia reaffirmed it’ll sharply cut output this year.】

item.title: 印度投资者大举买入黄金、白银ETF，股市却难以重拾涨势
item.description: 黄金短期内可能占据优势，因地缘政治和货币担忧持续存在。【原文：Gold may have an edge near term as geopolitical, currency worries persist.】

item.title: 澳大利亚储备银行的豪瑟警告通胀率"过高"，不能任其持续
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁·豪瑟警告称，通胀水平依然"过高"，对利率决策委员会构成重大挑战，该委员会不能容忍这种状况持续太久。【原文：Australia’s central bank Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser warned that inflation is still “too high” and remains a significant challenge for the interest-rate setting board, which can’t allow it to go on much longer.】

item.title: 三星股价逆势下跌，高管盛赞HBM4优势
item.description: 三星电子公司凭借其全新的HBM4技术重返内存行业顶峰，该公司总裁兼芯片部门首席技术官宋在铉周三表示，此消息令该公司股价跌势止住。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is back at the top of the memory industry with its new HBM4 technology, President and chip division Chief Technology Officer Jaihyuk Song said on Wednesday, erasing a drop in the company’s shares.】

item.title: 雷森债券持有人成立债权人委员会，聘请法律顾问
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴西乙醇和糖生产商雷森公司（Raizen SA）全球债券的持有者已组建债权人委员会，并聘请了法律顾问。【原文：Holders of Brazilian ethanol and sugar producer Raizen SA’s global bonds have formed a creditor committee and retained legal counsel, according to a person with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 中国年初工厂通缩幅度超预期收窄
item.description: 中国1月份工厂通缩程度低于预期，因大宗商品成本上升及政府打击企业过度竞争，价格下行压力有所缓解。【原文：China’s factory deflation eased more than expected in January, as downward pressure on prices moderates thanks to higher commodity costs and a crackdown on excessive competition among companies.】

item.title: 印度维持关键利率不变，资金市场悄然放松
item.description: 印度央行的大规模注资正实施着某些分析师所称的隐性宽松政策，推动关键隔夜借贷利率大幅低于基准利率。【原文：Large cash infusions by India’s central bank are delivering what some analysts describe as stealth policy easing, pushing a key overnight borrowing gauge well below the benchmark rate.】

item.title: 澳大利亚与欧盟进入长期贸易谈判的最后阶段
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长正前往布鲁塞尔与欧洲同行举行会谈，力图成功结束持续已久的贸易协定谈判。在日益动荡的全球环境中，双方都渴望签署协议并加强合作关系。【原文：Australia’s trade minister is headed to Brussels for talks with European counterparts in an attempt to successfully conclude long-running talks on a trade deal, with both sides keen to sign an agreement and tighten ties in an increasingly unpredictable global environment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚继续推进对富裕养老金储蓄者的增税计划
item.description: 澳大利亚政府将于周三重新推出针对最富裕退休储蓄者的增税法案，经过多年推动后，该法案拟于7月起实施。【原文：Australia’s government will introduce revived legislation on Wednesday for an additional tax on its wealthiest retirement savers, seeking to implement it from July after a years-long push.】

item.title: 亚洲市场蓬勃发展，进一步扩大对欧美市场的领先优势
item.description: 在又一个有望成为市场大年之际，亚洲股市正超越欧美同行，吸引着全球投资者。极端波动正冲击着从科技股到金属的各类资产。【原文：In what is shaping up to be another blockbuster year, Asia’s markets are outpacing peers in the US and Europe, drawing global investors as extreme swings rattle assets from tech stocks to metals.】

item.title: 中国多年减持美国国债预示更大风险
item.description: 中国最新表态称将削减持有的美国国债后，美债价格短暂下跌，但这凸显了北京方面十年来逐步减少美国债务的趋势，并重新引发了市场对全球范围内大规模撤资的担忧。【原文：The slump in Treasuries after China’s latest call to curb its holdings was fleeting, but it put a spotlight on Beijing’s decade-long shift from US debt and rekindled fears about a broader, global retreat.】

item.title: 中国白银供应紧缩持续，即便价格趋稳
item.description: 国际白银价格在经历剧烈震荡后趋于平稳，但中国市场供应仍显紧张，因投资需求与工业需求持续消耗库存。【原文：International silver prices have steadied after an epic bout of turbulence, but supplies in China are still being pinched as investment and industrial demand drain stockpiles.】

item.title: 华尔街的新交易策略是抛售任何被人工智能瞄准的股票
item.description: 在华尔街，对人工智能日益增长的担忧持续重创那些可能被技术浪潮反噬的企业股价，从小型软件公司到大型财富管理机构皆未能幸免。【原文：On Wall Street, rising fears about artificial intelligence keep pummeling the shares of companies at risk of being caught on the wrong side of it all, from small software companies to big wealth-management firms.】

item.title: 英国金融科技融资额去年下降21%，创2020年以来新低
item.description: 去年英国金融科技领域的投资额暴跌逾20%，跌至新冠疫情暴发以来的最低水平。投资者因宏观经济风险而犹豫不决，纷纷转向美国市场寻求机遇。【原文：Investment in the UK financial technology world plummeted by more than 20% last year to the lowest levels since the start of the Covid-19 pandemic, as backers hesitated on macroeconomic risks and flocked to US opportunities.】

item.title: 油价上涨，因伊朗局势紧张盖过库存增加迹象
item.description: 油价上涨，因中东局势聚焦伊朗的紧张态势盖过了美国行业报告显示库存大幅增加的影响。【原文：Oil gained as tensions in the Middle East focused on Iran outweighed a US industry report that pointed to a big rise in stockpiles.】

item.title: 金价维持在5000美元上方，美国数据强化降息预期
item.description: 金价小幅上涨——在每盎司5000美元上方巩固涨幅——此前美国疲软的零售销售数据强化了美联储降息的理由。【原文：Gold rose modestly — consolidating gains above $5,000 an ounce — after weak retail sales in the US supported the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 澳交所股价创两月最大跌幅，因首席执行官洛夫豪斯计划离职
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司股价下跌，此前该公司宣布深陷争议的首席执行官海伦·洛夫特豪斯将于5月离职，但未公布继任者人选。当前澳大利亚证券交易所正面临包括监管调查在内的多重挑战。【原文：ASX Ltd. shares declined after the company said embattled chief executive Helen Lofthouse will leave the role in May, without naming a successor as the Australian exchange grapples with challenges including a regulatory probe.】

item.title: 比特币鲸鱼再度买入，其他大买家纷纷撤离
item.description: 比特币刚刚获得部分最大持有者的新的支持，但需求的回归范围仍然相当有限，这令人质疑这究竟是复苏的信号，还是仅仅是损害控制的举措。【原文：Bitcoin has just drawn fresh support from some of its largest holders, though the return of demand remains narrow enough to raise doubts about whether it marks a recovery or mere damage control.】

item.title: 苏扎诺将因美元走弱而维持纸浆产量低于产能
item.description: 巴西苏扎诺公司首席执行官若昂·阿尔贝托·阿布雷乌表示，作为全球顶级纸浆出口商之一，该公司计划在2026年前保持低于满负荷的生产状态，因美元走弱正冲击其营收。【原文：Brazil’s Suzano SA, one of the world’s top exporters of pulp, plans to keep production below full capacity through 2026 as a weakening US dollar hurts revenue, Chief Executive Officer Joao Alberto Abreu said.】

item.title: 三星将于2月25日发布搭载人工智能技术的Galaxy S26系列智能手机
item.description: 三星电子将于2月25日在旧金山举办发布会，正式推出其最新主流Galaxy智能手机系列。此举旨在推动用户升级换代，并在与苹果iPhone及安卓阵营竞争对手的角逐中注入新动能。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. will unveil its latest mainstream Galaxy smartphones on Feb. 25 at an event in San Francisco, hoping to spur upgrades and fresh momentum in its rivalry with Apple Inc.’s iPhone and Android-based competitors.】

item.title: 高盛印度战略在竞争激烈的华尔街市场初见成效
item.description: 正是在新德里泰姬陵酒店举行的罕见全球董事会会议上，高盛集团印度区负责人提出了变革主张。【原文：It was at a rare global board meeting in New Delhi’s Taj Mahal Hotel that Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s India country head made the case for change.】

item.title: 新加坡总理黄循财筹备预算案，应对人工智能时代与贸易分歧
item.description: 新加坡总理黄循财很可能在周四的2026年预算案演讲中，将该国定位为人工智能枢纽。在全球贸易碎片化的背景下，这是新加坡政府推动经济增长引擎多元化的关键举措。【原文：Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong will likely use his 2026 budget speech Thursday to position the nation as an artificial intelligence hub, a key facet of his government’s effort to diversify growth engines as global trade fractures.】
